snippet: Nambar Enkhbayar was sentenced to four years in jail for corruption and the proceeds of his dealings were ordered confiscated, Chinese state media said Friday.
abstract: Former Pres Nambar Enkhbayar of Mongolia is sentenced to four years in jail for corruption and the proceeds of his dealings are ordered confiscated.
lead_paragraph: Nambar Enkhbayar was sentenced to four years in jail for corruption and the proceeds of his dealings were ordered confiscated, Chinese state media said Friday.
